column4: i need some help on partition on one hard drive i can see it i just can not put any thing on it
is there any one that can help me with partitions
is there any one that can help me with partitions
i need some help on partition on one hard drive i can see it i just can not put any thing on it
is it mounted rw or ro?
system->administration->disks  does that help at all?
you may need to edit /etc/fstab to mount the drive rw instead of ro  (read/write vs read only)
you may also need to add a 'user' flag to the mount options
did it work with user instead of nouser?
you have to unmount & remount the drive
get rid of all those flags and just use 'defaults' maybe.
the options, in the options column in fstab
sorry i dunno - maybe someone else can help.
